content.detailedDescription: I was delivering newspapers and just finished my last one when i looked out my windshield i saw a large florescent green sphere with a red fire like tail moving from over my car across the sky about 100-200 feet off the ground i watched it for about 20-30 seconds until it flew over the trees and out of site
content.summary: Ufo flew over my car

content.detailedDescription: 10:00 pm eastern time - i walked out my back door. noticed an odd color in the sky. very bright orange. not very high in the sky. it is overcast today, so it was below the cloudy haze. it was moving west right over the ohio/mich border. there was no noise either. i am an avid sky watcher and ive never seen that color of orange ever.
content.summary: Glowing orange, a color ive never seen in the sky. steady moderate speed.

content.detailedDescription:
This experiences have been happening since 2010. they have differet looks. some are human-like dark complexioned and bald. some are elongated, thin and there is a kind like its all typical alien-look, some look like apes and like half/animal-half human look, the ones i see on trees look like reptiians, some camouflage themselves by using leaves or barks, there tiny ones that has weird shapes and another kind is all white, very white.
i cant finish tthis right now. they are watching me.
content.summary: I have experiencing these since 2010 and they always follow me whereever i move, and i moved three times.

content.detailedDescription: Drinking coffee at approximately 5:20 am,july 17th  leaving for work. looking at half moon in south sky over house. noticed bright star in south west horizon. first thought it was venus but realized venus would be in the eastern horizon.[morning star]have seen venus the evening star in same location before. i then turned around looking at the whole sky and did see venus in the eastern horizon. realizing this i turned back and saw this bright star like object rising into the sky. at first i thought it was the space station or satellite orbiting over me.Then i thought it was a plane but as it went overhead i saw no flashing lights or noise.It was hard to tell the size or altitude because it was dawn and the sky light was changing.It disappeared through the clouds in the northeastern sky like a bright star.It was  slow smooth straight and steady.All day i thought about this,do satellites orbit from southwest to northeast ? a flying object with no flashing lights? i have never seen nothing like this before ? at cloud level? my wife said nasa has space craft they are flying? now ill be watching the sky and have my camera ready.
content.summary: A unexpected event that still has me wondering what it was?

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our front porch in hampstead, carroll county, md watching fireworks straight across the street. our main road runs nw to se. in the northwestern part of the sky a bright red-orange orb appeared out of nowhere. i pointed it out to my husband, who also observed this orb. we then watched it travel from nw to se for approximately 30 seconds. the object traveled in a straight line and went from red-orange, to orange-yellow, then white in color before slowly fading away. this object grabbed my attention because it was so large and quickly became the brightest thing in the sky. it did not look like a star, a meteor, fireworks, or anything else we have ever seen in the sky.
content.summary: Red-orange ufo appears from nw and travels se before fading to white and then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was in the backyard going out for my daily walk.

2. what made you first notice the object?

i always look up at the sky. and i noticed something different. three star-like objects together that weren't there before.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

my first thought was a helicopter. but one was already flying around in the opposite direction.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

the objects i saw were star-like. they looked like they were glowing a bit. i think they were pretty high up since it was sort of faint how they glowed or their light... at first there was only 3 and they glowed more brighter. it looked as if they were hovering. sort of like they were waiting. because shortly after a few more came out nowhere! many. i know that it can't possibly be helicopters because they were flying too close to each other and steady. after more joined together they started to fly closer to where i was watching them. they formed a "v" shape. and when they were directly above me and those that were watching with me. they formed a straight line. almost like putting on a show for us! they stopped moving and they were just hovering above us. we kept our eyes on them the whole time. and slowly they disappeared. almost like as they were fading away? but so quick. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

my feelings? well i was pretty excited. my reactions were to get someone out there with me so that i can have someone be a witness to what i was seeing in the sky. after my brother and two others came out we kept our eyes on them. my brother took a few pictures but his camera didn't take any well... so nothing i can share really. just this report on them. 
when we couldn't see them anymore we stayed a few minutes out there looking for them but nothing. the other's were a bit scared and fascinated by them.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
they sorta faded away.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 3 star-like objects seemed to hover together. then more joined out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars as i do every night and the object appeared in the northeastern part of the sky. i noticed it because it was bright. it was a bright orangish light/orb to the naked eye and when i took pictures it appeared as a white object that in each picture had a different shape. the object hovered for about 5 minutes growing brighter and brighter. it took off towards the east and was gone within a few seconds. i felt amazed because this is the third time i have seen this object in the last month. i took many pictures during the event i think the total is 13 pictures. in every picture it is a different shape. after it had left i went in and told my parents. i did not tell them during the event because i was afraid that if i went inside to tell them that it would be gone before they could get outside and see it as it was the previous two times that i saw it. i had no idea what the object was i just know that i have seen it twice before and that it was not a helicopter or an airplane. i am sending 10 pictures because that is the most that i can send.
content.summary: Bright orangish light hovering but in pictures white and changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for coffee to brew on my porch around 5 am when it was still very dark. i saw what i thought was a firework at first, but it glided slowly up for a few seconds going south and then arced lazily down behind a treetop and winked out like a switch had been turned off. it was a very bright green orb that seemed to glow. i didn't hear it make any noise, but there was a garbage truck emptying dumpsters nearby so i couldn't really hear. i tried to match something in my head up with what i saw but i have never seen anything like it before. i was and remain a little freaked out and very curious.
content.summary: I was sitting on my porch when i noticed what looked like a bright green firework. it ascended slowly for a few seconds then glided down behind a treetop and winked out.

content.detailedDescription:
On my back porch, watching the skies and talking to my bother- in- law, i'm not sure if i thought what it was, strange watched for a couple seconds ran got mt phone to take a pick of it, but it was behinds trees at the time, and the phone was dead, so i went back to put in on charger came back out a few min. later another one came by same flight pattern ,disappeared be the trees also,,,,,,,note the news is saying it was a meteorite, what the pic they showing is nothing like what we saw



 thank you
content.summary: Balloon like orange, looked like it was be propelled by fire

content.detailedDescription:
A forest fire broke out on the mountain behind us and during the attempt to put it out, this event took place.
i was watching a video online of the fire from a little earlier in the day and i spotted the ufo 37 seconds into the video. i have no idea whether anyone else has noticed this or not. most folks would be focused on the fire.

37 seconds into the video the ufo comes shooting out from a cloud right above the mountain and passes through a clear spot back into the next cloud. i was quite startled and surprised when i saw it. 
the ufo left a thin trail of cloud vaper as it exited the cloud. this, to me, eliminates any thought that this might be a camera lens artifact or light phenomenon effect.

the event lasted only a couple seconds. judging by the distance i was from the object it had to have been moving very fast. the scene cuts away while the ufo is still visible. i'm left to assume that there must be more footage of it than i saw.

i phoned the website's news department to ask if it would be possible to see the full footage, but was met with disapproval. in retrospect, perhaps i shouldn't have mentioned the word ufo. (lol)

the gentleman however did say i could email him or call him the next day to discuss this further. i will this follow up with further contact.


ps: i do not own the footage i am submitting. but i don't know how else to give you the proof of this event. so i will submit it and leave it to you folks to decide how to deal with it. this is not my area of expertise.
content.summary: Shot out from the clouds above the mountain during a forest fire near our nieghbourhood. it pulled a wisp of  cloud with it as it exited.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This happened when i stepped out for a bit of air, i looked up to the sky as it was a cloudy night and i had thought it would rain, but when i looked up i saw 4 lights, at first i thought that they were circus lights, so i looked around but i could not find any place of origin for that light, so i tried focusing and those lights started moving all around in circles. i called up everyone (4 people) and well even our dog accompanied them. and we observed the four lights in complete awe as we have never seen anything like this before.  the lights moved from right-left, north-south and vice versa. i called up my friends in a news channel to do a night/space watch to observe it but they couldn't find it. this went on for 15 minutes and then it changed position, it started going in circles. i tried photographing this event but since it was dark, i couldn't. it kept moving in increasing speed and one moment here, then when you see it again, it has like teleported. it just glowed and didn't land, we could just make out that it's circular and glows because it was just glowing. it didn't practically disappear, but it was moving way too fast for us to find it, so we went inside... but before we went inside, our all dog started puking around and well after a month, it died. well our dog was a bit old and had two surgeries but he suddenly fell ill :( but we never believed ,in aliens, until that day. it was an amazing experience but people think that there are no ufo sightings in india and i'm reporting this and i'm thankful to find mufon. i hope you look into this and well sorry for reporting a year later, but hey we didn't know bout mufon back then!
content.summary: Ufo hovers over at around midnight, witnessed family reports.

content.detailedDescription: I was cycling between the buildings at that time an air force training aeroplane was going from above my head. suddenly a bright white colored beam has crossed the aeroplane diagonally for some height above the aeroplane. it was very fast so i coulds not click any photographs or videos.
content.summary: It went like a beam by the aeroplane.

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in side yard and saw object, a round blue-green light moving from my right to my left descending at less than 100 mph at about a 30 degree angle, higher than the closest trees, no sound, no tail, just a round circle of glowing blue green light. the object appeared to be less than a mile from me. i drove my 4 wheeler towards the area that it would have landed or hit the ground but could not get close enough to see anything. this is a very rural area. it did not look like a meteor and was going a lot slower than any meteor that i have ever seen. i thought wow, it might be a ufo. the time was about 535 am on july 18, 2014.
content.summary: Decending from  right to left at less than 100 mph

content.detailedDescription: I had 1 of these orange orbs come right over my house ,very silent and very bright.Was moving about 15 mph and was about 50ft above the ground.It wasnt a balloon or a chinese lantern.It looked like a small sun,it slowed down when it got over my house then sped up back up to its normal speed,then did  a 90 degree turn and went on its way.Was amazing,it was about 10 -20 ft and kept the same height  ﻿
content.summary: Very bright light

content.detailedDescription: Driving home in my neighborhood when girlfriend in passenger seat asked what those objects are.  i could not see them due to the roof/angle and she made me turn around.  we witnessed approx 16 reddish orange glowing orbs flying in formation (like a loosely organized group of geese).  you could tell they were solid and under intelligent control.  they maintained a fairly straight path, but when you singled one out, you could tell it was wobbling and a bit jerky, not like a plane/bird, etc.  formation bumbled along for a good 3 minutes before the lead craft got to a point in the sky, dimmed to half brightness, then just a pinpoint and then vanished.  over the next 2 minutes the rest of the craft in formation went to the exact spot in the sky and repeated the dimming cycle before vanishing.  we started talking about it, think it was over when 2 more popped up from behind homes on the horizon and then slowly bumbled their way over the next 1-2 minutes to the same spot and vanished in the same fashion.
content.summary: 16 pulsating orbs flying in a a formation spanning a mile.  all went to the exact same spot in the sky and vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
About 4 am this morning (july 18, 2014) i happened to step out on my deck which overlooks a portion of the valley sw of monroe, wa. it was dark with either no or high, thin cloud cover. at first i thought i was seeing a large plane -- by all intents it appeared to have a wing span, although no shape definition in the dark -- with red lights at outer ends, but after a few seconds i noticed a few things which took it out of "plane" category:  (1) absolutely no sound, and for a craft this size (and that close) there should have been something  (2) it wasn't traveling fast enough to be a plane. for about 2 minutes it practically hovered over the valley and over the course of 4 min it "drifted" sw till it went out of view. (3) there was an "array" of other smaller lights "twinkling" on it, giving it an overal shape of either a boomerang or disc.  the smaller lights were sort of sparkling in various places sequentially.

i grabbed binoculars and leaned into a post to try to get a solid view, but it wasn't any more conclusive than naked eye.

i don't know what this was.  i'm not going to say it was this or that, i'm just saying it was not like any plane i've ever seen, and absolutely soundless.  was really cool to watch.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Too big to be plane -- and too many lights -- and didn't move normally

content.detailedDescription:
on approx 8pm, roommate and friends called me out of the house to come check out a full  half circle rainbow, i grabbed smart phone took two pictures. switched phone to video mode (5 mega pixles) and filmed the entire rainbowand noted a strange cluster of
clouds, i make the comment it looks as if a ufo could come out of that strange cluster of
clouds, i capture that it is about :36 seconds. 
here is link to that on youtube.

look up blazze2k8 on you tube

     i put phone on standby but still in video mode, and go in to use the bathroom. they run back in and yell that i have to come back out and see this it is a ufo, i turn back on phone, before i go out front door. (driveway faces south west) asa i walk out i see a very right light up in the sky start record, then watch most of the sighting with my eyes, checking the screen to make sure i had it centered correctly,
     what i saw is the light go up, come back down, the strange clouds had disapated, above and below the object, then as it made a slow descent i saw 2 separate lights above a lower disc shaped color of a dark royal blue or purple, almost a blacklight color but brighter. the 2 light above it which took up 70% of it were very large and bright, with a
definate separation of the 2 in the middle. this can be seen on a large screen hi def tv.
    as it decended it slowed, then as it got lower below the power lines and near roof tops
it appeared to be miles away south west of town, i mention sara park in the video but
my direction is off it appears to be 5 to 7 miles south of town in a desert area. no houses or buildings there, as it got to the roof line the left side appeared to me to flash a very bright red light on one sideas it hovered above the roof line a few seconds then dipped below that and went out of site,
     the other 3 witness's saw it ascend quickly lower, then rise again, that is when i caught this on video here: (1:36) 


look up blazze2k8 on youtube

     that was it! my roommate called the non emergency police line to ask if any calls had come it. and they had not had any but requested to come see the video, roommate said no...Lol...

my father was a pilot and i have been in many planes before, this had none of the normal markings of a plane. no tail lights wing lights and the lights were too huge to be landing lights. we are on the south side of the city, the airport is far north of here and it only went up and down in direction. my roommate said it rose very quickly high at 1st then kept the same speed shown on video. 

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in lake havasu city arizona july13 2014

content.detailedDescription: 1995 or 1996 friends invited me to  go camping. we lived in idaho springs, colorado and worked at the indian hot springs resort as maintenance director. we were above the hot springs on a hill. too many rocks by fire, could not sleep so moved under pine tree to lay on softer ground. i was awakened by what felt like a dogs cold nose in my ear and herd what sounded like hoofs running away. i got up to take a leak and saw what looked like a falling star at first in distance. however it did not burn out, or hit the ground and headed right toward me. as it grew nearer it grew larger and larger. the brightest and whitest light i had ever seen. it was a sphere like the moon with no dark spots. it stopped right in front of me and right over my head. again it was huge and i was frozen stiff. it made a very low pitched noise like a rumble. i closed one eye as they trained me in the military for aerial flairs because the lite was sooo very bright. the sound stated to go away when i herd more loud sound and here came 3 fighter jets in formation they were so low and the jet in front banked right between myself and this object. i could see the silo wet of the pilot. and the ufo took off like a bullet, made the jets look like they were standing still. i think i was in shock and sat on a rock. my friends sleep through the who thing. i sat there never moving till they woke. i told them what happened and of course the laughed and asked what i was smoking. the next morning my friends came to me at work with a copy of the denver post and it was all over the front page. bright lite in sky seen from mexico to colorado where they said it made a left turn and went west threw nevada, california, and disappeared heading out to the pacific. it has haunted all these years but all info on my siting seems to have vanished. i have found only a few such descriptions from the past that are similar. in the bible and a  astrologer who was apparently famous in his day from europe i believe during the renaissance period. i now have a very bad cataract on my right eye only, broke myself up some and am disabled and also have advanced cancer and am desperate for come confirmation and or closure. i am awake allot nights and can't sleep and on clear night look to the stars for a return. i have always had a feeling it sought me out and the jets chased it away.I long to return to the site but am so poor i can barely pay attention let alone afford to go back. please help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge pure white sphere, fist thought falling star, never hit ground came straight to me, hovered over me, was frozen stiff, 3 jet fighters came in formation, took off like bullet, was one front page of denver post, now can find no evidence

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting :  pahrump / las vegas 
around 11:30pm,  june /july, 2013 i was out with my dogs in my backyard  in pahrump, nv just 40 miles from las vegas when i saw a huge white round light in the sky just  hovering over the mountain between pahrump & las vegas.  suddenly, the white light  split into 2 smaller lights then after maybe 30 seconds they winked out & just disappeared.

the white light was the size of a grapefruit if i held it at arms length.   when it split into 2 smaller lights they were about half the size of the 1st light.
content.summary: Ufo sighting :  pahrump / las vegas  around 11:30pm,  june /july, 2013 i was out with my dogs in pahrump, nv just 40 miles from las vegas when i saw a huge white round light in the sky just  hovering over the mountain between pahrump & las vegas.  suddenl

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I haven't seen these lights in a couple months. i honestly get a bit excited, as well as a little freaked out. i've only seen these same lights 3 times before. this july 4th being the 4th time, go figure. and as i've said before, it has to be more than a coincidence that i wasn't the only one seeing these lights around new years, in other states as well. thought i was going crazy. 

i was in the car with my mom and my sister, since we were coming back from fireworks. it was quite cloudy that night since it had been raining a lot the previous day, and it was smoky from all the fireworks being shot off. i noticed while looking out the window, even with it being very not visible in the sky, the same lights that i have seen before. at first i brushed it off because it could have been a spark from the firework debris. i shouted "look, it's the "alien lights" again". my sister never believed me when i would describe these strange lights in the sky. she started saying "holy crap, those are not normal lights". i can brush these off and say, maybe they are lanterns. but i don't think this is the case with these sky lights.

it's a hard street/road to park on, so we stopped on the side and i did my best to not move around a lot with my digital camera. thanking my lucky starts i had it with me this time. it was noisy from traffic and popping sounds of fireworks, but you never hear anything in the sky from these things. they're always in a vertical row, not always one beneath the other in perfect formation, but this group was in a formation pretty much. what i did noticed while looking at my video footage was the 2 of the lights zoom to the right and just disappears. my sister said she also saw another light come out and drop down then hovered in place.

when i recorded the last one, because the rest disappeared, it glowed then vanished. whenever i zoom in and try to it again, it's nowhere to be found.
content.summary: July 4th red lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On may 7, 1992 a smaller orb ufo that was white, round, ball of light and energy traveled over frayser just above the tree tops the size of a beach ball (3 to 5 feet diameter) traveling in the morning at 3 to 5 mph and was observed by me. i first saw it at the area of new allen rd and frayser blvd. while taking my morning walk.  it was noticed over a large field travelling over a lone tree near frayser blvd. heading slowly south over a residential area.  it was a quarter of a mile from some power lines that also crossed frayser blvd. on a north-south direction.  it possibly higher than i estimated and larger but it seemed to be above the tree.  there was no trail behind it and it was moving slowly. the sky was clear with no noticeable wind.  i believe it has something to do with the 1964 "moon of memphis" ufo that i observed years before because the ufo spirits that i was hearing in my mind seem to talk about it.  from the 1964 ufo event, if you take the mathematical sin(64) = .92 and the numeric sum of frayser equals 92. i believe that the god mind of the frayser community was honoring this neighborhood of memphis, tn (usa); if you take 1992 - 1964 = 28 which is the sum of the digits of my birthdate 11-04-1957 = 28 and the numeric sum of the word "eden".  if you take the numeric number of the month of may (5) and add to the digits of the year 1992 you get 26 which is the sum of the word "god";  if you add the digits of the date 5-7-1992 then you get 33 which is the sum of the word "amen".   it is interesting to note that my grandfather who once lived in frayser died at age 92 and maybe this little orb ufo was his spirit. i call this little orb ufo the "frayser fireball". the "frayser fireball" ufo seems to relate to the "moon of memphis" ufo enough to suggest that it was created by god or the larger "moon of memphis" ufo for me to witness and report on. the numerology related to it makes it a miracle given to me.  i sensed that i was meant to view this 1992 ufo like i was meant to view the 1964 ufo.

���@
content.summary: Round white glowing sphere with whurls of light and energy surrounding it.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from work june 21st around 8am, i noticed an object hovering above the tree line about 1 mile to the south.  at first i thought it may be a crop plane. i stopped and watched the object for about 5 min and it did not move in any direction.  i wanted to drive closer to have a look but many of the roads were washed out due to the high overland flooding in the area so i was unable to drive for a closer look.  after i took a picture of the object i continued my drive home.
content.summary: Ufo hovered above trees, noticed while driving

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch smoking when i saw a flashing red light out of the corner of my eye. i saw a red football shaped object in front of the tree line. it was completely silent and moved back behind the trees and i could no longer see it. it was the strangest thing that i have ever seen. my boyfriend and i went into the house and got our guns and flashlights before going out to look and see if there was any evidence on our property. we walked through the yard where the object was seen. we didn't see anything but had an eery feeling and were both very scared. we heard a noise in the direction the object was in that sounded like something dropped and got even more freaked out. our 2 children were in the house and i got very worried that something could happen to us and our kids would be all alone. we do live near fort a.P. hill where they do test different weapons and aircraft. we have seen a lot of things in the sky that have come from there but this didn't appear to be anything that originated on earth or from a.P. hill.
content.summary: Football shaped red fireball, flashing and then disappeared behind tree line

content.detailedDescription: Was on a ferris wheel when i snapped a shot of the surrounding fair grounds and city lights. i did not notice the ufo until the next day when i was going through all the pics i took from the day before.
content.summary: Noticed ufo in pic i took while on a ferris wheel.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Bright star-like object shot down from sky abruptly with a tail, and then a glowing red(like hot coal) slowly ascended like a floating fireball in a straight line upwards until it was no longer visible
content.summary: Bright star-like object shot down from sky abruptly with a tail, and then a glowing red(like hot coal) slowly ascended

content.detailedDescription: We are a private research communications center. formally "the weather bubble research center, now billed as high tower command center. (intentionally no website) research includes, ionospheric heater research, weather wars, alien / ufo investigations and paranormal research. our com center is armed with a battery of computers and high tech gear. our antennas are self designed, built and installed. we achieved target lock on on the above mentioned time and date. sending first draft photo from infrared video camera. a full analysis of this photo is now in the works but will take some time for full analysis. there is some commmentary at bottom of attached word document that has photo pasted on it.In com center at the time and doing usual sky scan. duration time as stated above. object / objects then went out of range to southeast (joliet?) no surprise to me. see much of this via frequency waves etc.
content.summary: Picked this image up on our private com center infrared camera

content.detailedDescription: Subject and his girlfriend were watching fireworks out side his home when they saw a bright red ambient light moving slowly across the sky. it was not a flare  subject saw it blink out and come on again following the same path  the orb shaped object pulsated and blinked off and appeared further down the road
content.summary: Subject was watching fire works with his girl friend out side when he saw a bright red light moving accross the sky, disappear and reappear

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the back yard having a smoke talking to two friends. earlier about 30 mins before hand i thought i saw a strange light from the trees and brushed it off as a plane. 

we were sitting in the back yard talking and i caught a strange light through the trees again. ii watched it for a second and then got up and followed it with excitement. one friend followed with me and watched and another friend just sat there not paying attention but said he saw the light. it traveled left through the trees and then ascended a little, it was a bright white bluesh color and was traveling at a vary fast speed. it went from traveling left and as sending to making a quick right turn without stopping. it then turned left again and turned to a greenish and then rose red color. at that time i ran into the house to grab my phone, i was about 5 seconds. when i came back out my friend that was watching it said it turned sharp right again when i just got back. it then just stopped in mid air for a second and descended. we didn't get any photos or video as my friends phone died when he tried to record it and my storage was full on my phone. 

after we saw it descend i grabbed the car keys and we went out looking for it. we didn't find anything but for some reason the air traffic was a little crazier than usual. we are located close to newark and  teterboro airport. it seemed there was a lot more planes in the area than usual and also there were i'd say close to 20 planes that were flying very low after the object was seen. it's not unusual to see low flying planes but not that many in the space of 20 mins. hopefully the radar for that night can be viewed. i have seen many ufo's but this was by far the best. i debunked it from everything i know of but i'm not sure if it could may have been a drone as i'm not sure how they maneuver.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Really bright ufo traveling at fast speeds, sharp turns and descended

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Unknown
content.detailedDescription: They are still here so close to civalisation and far into the mountains. the tunnals are still there and they still come and go. i dont know why im reporting them for iv ben atact so much from those that dont want people to know that they are here and i acept everthing with onar. i fil i am sopose to keep people informed of all the ufos in the mountains and keep a sence of dignaty to myself. all iv seen and study and found has change me to were all i can do is to keep on reporting as i find them and i think that one day they will be known and untill then ill do what im sopose to do.This is happening all the time and they are not leving i think they are here to stay. iv seen all different entatizes in the past but i have yet to make contact with them    latter
content.summary: They are still here in tunnals hovering in front of cliff over tree tops and on the grond

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work when i walked outside to call my dad when i saw a couple of
lights hovering nearby. a series of lights, about a dozen, began flashing 
at random. i could not tell at first if this was one large object or numerous 
objects hovering in formation. i reported this to my father who at home 
about 6 miles away when he went outside and reported to me that he could also see it. the oject began to accellerate slowly towards the east then turned 
north. then i realized this was one single large object. it continued to accellerate at a stedy pace untill it was obscured by a nearby tree line.
my father and i expressed mutual suprise and decicided to meet. i remained outside about 1 1/2 hours, but saw nothing else. i was hoping we were not the
only ones to see this object otherwise i may not have reported it.
content.summary: Elongated cigar shaped
